ai-snp2.3:1.1_0: And when you reach the far shore
ai-snp2.3:1.3_0: he’s unable to ende the deeds;
ai-snp2.3:1.4_0: this is how it leads to me.
ai-snp2.3:3.1_0: You’re not diligent by the sound of your friends,
ai-snp2.3:3.3_0: and the son of the Sakyans,
ai-snp2.3:3.4_0: by dividing their wealth in four.
ai-snp2.3:4.3_0: they develop a fruit of fruit,
ai-snp2.3:5.1_0: Having drunk the nectar of seclusion
ai-snp2.3:5.3_0: free of stress, free of evil,
ai-snp2.3:5.4_0: one drinks the joyous nectar of Dhamma.
ai-snp2.3:5.5_0: For the third Lord of Death is the third
